name: ground-gem
effect: Held : When the holder uses a damaging ground-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging ground-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text.black-white: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move only once.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move only once.
